user_query: I want to discover new music related to a specific genre. Please fetch me the tracks, albums, and details of the artist associated with the genre 'rock'. Also, provide me with the music links for the tracks and albums.

TaskList.description: Fetch tracks related to the genre 'rock'.
Fetch albums associated with the fetched rock tracks.
Fetch artist details for the artists of the fetched rock tracks.
Retrieve music links for the fetched tracks and albums.
